GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
drm/rockchip: lvds: fix PM usage counter unbalance in poweron

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit f6ed73db390319b248b91a6325da1a48ad85e0d1, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 34cc0aa2545603560c79aaea3340d8ff3a71bd10. For more details please see the references link.
